name: 脫離苦海
description:
沒時間解釋快上船! 往明天的道路，出!航!
脫離苦海
某艘貨輪因為之前卡再了運河而被求償270億，因為繳不出錢而被擋在苦海上。
身為船長的你，有辦法逃出這片水域重獲自由嗎?

No time to explain, get on board! To the road of tomorrow, SHUKKOU!
Escape from the Great Bitter Lake
A cargo ship is being asked for 27 billion dollars  because it got stuck in the canal before, and is detained in the bitter lake because it can't pay.
As the captain of the ship, do you have a way to escape from these waters and regain your freedom?

製作-Staff-

程式Programing: CJ, Gunpow,Ellyn
地形建置GeoModdling:Ellyn
關卡設計LevelDesign:Gunpow
2D美術2DGraphics: Shift
音效SoundDesign: CJ

音樂來源NusicSource: Dova-syndrome free copyright music library
3D 模型來源3DModleSource: cgtrader.com
